Possibilities preoperatively identify patient risk limit ( Devereaux und Sessler , 2015 ; Gillmann et al. , 2014 ) prophylactic intervention yet establish controversial ( Devereaux und Sessler , 2015 ) . Selected leukocyte subpopulation demonstrate associate high risk cardiovascular event ( Berg et al. , 2012 ; Cheng et al. , 2008 ; Engelbertsen et al. , 2012 ; Kotfis et al. , 2015 ; Rogacev et al. , 2011 ; Rogacev et al. , 2012 ) .The aim study analyze whether surgical stress ( non-cardiac surgery ) induce quantitative change one several leukocyte subpopulation whether quantitative change associate perioperative cardiovascular event . Therefore , high-risk cardio-vascular patient schedule non-cardiac surgery recruit . Blood drawn predefined time point surgery three day postoperatively . Leukocytes analyzed flow cytometry . During 30 day follow adverse cardiovascular event record . ECGs record preoperatively post-OP day 3 . High-sensitive cardiac Troponin T measure prior operation post-OP day one three . The patient chart screen cardio vascular event day 30 . A telephone interview perform detect cardiovascular event discharge post-OP day 30 .
